name: OmegaStarFighter
description:
In the distant future, you are a Commander for the Alliance testing out their latest in space combat technology. While on a routine testing run, you stumble upon a plot that holds the fate of the Alpha/Beta Quadrants in the balance.

A dialogue-driven shoot-em-up space opera.

Side View 2D Space Combat 

Please leave feedback on google forms https://forms.gle/JMN4QbRyFsGuAE8D6 
If you downloaded 0.1, download 0.15 as the latest playable version. 0.1 has been hidden from further downloads.
